sentences.en: After the second day, recovered from seasickness, the full passenger list was in evidence, and the more he saw of the passengers the more he disliked them.
sentences.cn: 过了第二天，晕船的都恢复过来，全船旅客都—一露了面。 他越和旅客们来往就越不喜欢他们。

sentences.en: But for Florence a " visceral dread, a helpless disgust as palpable as seasickness " is overwhelming her.
sentences.cn: 但对佛罗伦萨而言, “ 一种和晕船一样明显、发自内心的恐惧和无助的恶心 ” 正席卷全身.

sentences.en: Commonly used drugs such as methyldopa , Symmetrel, Inderal, cimetidine, scopolamine seasickness patches, and digitalis preparations.
sentences.cn: 常用药物,如甲基多巴 、 盐酸金刚烷胺、心得安 、 甲腈咪胺 、 莨菪胺晕船膏药和洋地黄制剂.

sentences.en: Europeans take melons for a preventive against seasickness.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人吃瓜作为预防晕船的方法.

sentences.en: He was very prone to seasickness and already felt queasy.
sentences.cn: 他快晕船了，已经感到恶心了。

sentences.en: I focused on the horizon through my porthole or sought solace in Darwin’s Beagle journal:he suffered terribly from seasickness, and he was at sea for nearly five years.
sentences.cn: 我把注意力集中在舷窗外的海平线上，或者从想象达尔文的比格尔海峡之旅中寻求一点安慰：达尔文因晕船痛苦不堪，但是他坚持在海上呆了五年。

sentences.en: I have some tablets for seasickness.
It is mainly used to treat summer - head, mind - cold due to exogenous evils , headache, nausea vomiting, seasickness , carsickness, etc.
sentences.cn: 主要用于治疗暑热 、 外感风寒 、 头痛 、 恶心呕吐 、 晕船等病证.

sentences.en: Many cases of seasickness originate in indigestion.
sentences.cn: 许多人晕船是由于消化不良而引起的.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the correlation between personality trait, cognitive style and seasickness symptoms.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨人格特质 、 认知方式与晕船症状的关系,寻找预测晕船易感性的心理学指标.

sentences.en: Sally always suffers from seasickness when she is at sea.
Seaborne financial investors could be in for a bout of seasickness.
sentences.cn: 海运业务的金融投资者可能会有些晕船。

sentences.en: Seasickness has no personal meaning for me.
The ship rocked violently from side to side, causing many passengers to feel seasickness.
sentences.cn: 4轮船剧烈地左右晃动, 许多乘客都晕船了.
